Hmm. There are conflicting studies about whether changing the speed limits increases or reduces the frequency of accidents. One which said increasing it slightly wonâ€™t and it has something to do with psychology. If the speed limit is too low  people will tend to speed far over the limit because they think itâ€™s unreasonable. If itâ€™s too high  more prone to accidents since vehicles canâ€™t break. So I guess we need to find the sweet the spot. If they donâ€™t want to make the speed limit too high  no choice but to put speed enforcement cameras in a lot more places
